name: 4-hydroxyphenylacetaldehyde-oxime,NADPH:oxygen oxidoreductase (adding cysteine)
definition: (E)-4-Hydroxyphenylacetaldehyde oxime + L-Cysteine + NADPH + Oxygen + H+ <=> S-(Hydroxyphenylacetothiohydroximoyl)-L-cysteine + NADP+ + 2 H2O
